title: He Made The Worst Political Decision Possible (Ep 1320)
description:
In this episode, I address the troubling picture which surfaced in the Epstein case. I also discuss the real problem Joe Biden is going to have with his VP pick, Kamala Harris. Finally, I address the tech tyrants latest move to suppress free speech. 

News Picks:

Please help support the heroes who own Atilis Gym. They are under attack. Here’s the link to help. 

Photos surface showing Clinton on Jeffrey Epstein’s jet.

Remember when Kamala Harris “believed” Joe Biden’s accusers? 

Kamala Harris is more liberal than Bernie Sanders. 

Melbourne, Australia needs our help. Their civil liberties are being washed away. 


The hero gym owners in Bellmawr, NJ are under attack again. 

President Trump’s approval ratings among Black Americans is looking pretty good.

Bongino Report is replacing Drudge Report and its liberal drudgery. 


NBA Coach is still promoting the false “hands up” Michael Brown narrative. 


The real story behind “hands up, don’t shoot.”

Joe Biden has been wrong on everything. 

Nancy Pelosi forced to acknowledge that China prefers Joe Biden.
